caption: Educating from behind the chair provides ✨results✨ that last far longer than a salon visit ✂️.  On @behindthechair_com’s recent live @salonbkb chatted about the different types of hair thinning, and which TRIPHASIC formula was right for you or your client.   ✨ She uses HEAD SPA Complexe 5 on every client for shiny healthy hair.  She identifies which type of hair thinning her client has  💧 TRIPHASIC Reactional Concentrated Serum is for those with sudden, temporary thinning hair.  💦 TRIPHASIC Progressive Concentrated Serum is for those with hereditary, hormonal hair thinning.
